termsAndConditions:
Please note that 0% VAT tariff is applicable to this order according to EC 6th VAT directive 2006/112, Art 148.

 

All items should be in compliance with Marine Equipment Directive 2014/90/EU, with MEPC 269.(68) and all other
 regulations in force.

 

THE MINIMUM QUANTITY OF PACKAGING MATERIALS TO BE UTILISED, TAKING INTO CONSIDERATION THE

SAFETY AND SECURITY OF THE ITEMS DELIVERED. WHEREVER POSSIBLE, PACKAGING SHOULD BE MANUFACTURED FROM

RENEWABLE AND/ OR RECYCLABLE RESOURCES UTILISING THE MINIMUM QUANTITY OF PLASTICS. PACKAGING REMAINING ON THE

VESSEL WILL BE DISPOSED OF WITHIN THE RELEVANT COMPANY, NATIONAL AND INTERNATIONAL REGULATIONS.

PLS MAKE SURE THAT ALL PRODUCTS INQUIRED OR PURCHASED BY Q-SHIP MANAGEMENT ARE ASBESTOS FREE.

THE OBJECTIVE OF THE BAN IS TO ELIMINATE HARMFUL EXPOSURE TO ASBESTOS AND REDUCE FUTURE DEATHS AND ILLNESS.

THE INQUIRY NUMBER AND THE VESSEL NAME MUST BE CLEARLY STATED ON YOUR QUOTATION. :AND: This Purchase Order is subject to the Conditions of Purchase found at http://carnivaluksupplier.co.uk/SupplierDocuments.aspx unless a separate signed agreement between the parties exists.  Vendor acknowledges that Carnival has established a Business Partner Code of Conduct that can also be found at the link above.
